name: veaury
description: Use React in Vue3 and Vue3 in React, And as perfect as possible!

scripts.remotedev:vue: cross-env BUILD_TYPE=remote npm run serve --prefix dev-project-vue3
scripts.remotedev:react: cross-env BUILD_TYPE=remote npm run start --prefix dev-project-react
scripts.remotebuild:vue: cross-env BUILD_TYPE=remote npm run build --prefix dev-project-vue3
scripts.remotebuild:react: cross-env BUILD_TYPE=remote npm run build --prefix dev-project-react
scripts.dev-setup:npm: npm i --prefix dev-project-vue3 && npm i --prefix dev-project-react
scripts.setup: yarn && npm run dev-setup:yarn && npm run test-setup:yarn
scripts.remote-beta:yarn: yarn add veaury@beta --cwd dev-project-vue3 && yarn add veaury@beta --cwd dev-project-react && yarn add veaury@beta --cwd tests
scripts.remote-latest:yarn: yarn add veaury --cwd dev-project-vue3 && yarn add veaury --cwd dev-project-react && yarn add veaury --cwd tests
scripts.remote-beta:npm: npm i veaury@beta --prefix dev-project-vue3 && npm i veaury@beta --prefix dev-project-react && npm i veaury@beta --prefix tests
scripts.remote-latest:npm: npm i veaury --prefix dev-project-vue3 && npm i veaury --prefix dev-project-react && npm i veaury --prefix tests

author: 天堂里的花大咩
